notes: Use instantly.
Use instantly.
Use instantly.
If two cards, use Royal second to draw 2 new cards.
Use Quadra Accelerate or Scratch Dealer to gain 4 stacks with the effect of Balance.
Use autoattacks to reach 4 stacks with the effect of Three-Headed Snake.
Use within 30s of next Awakening use, otherwise use before Celestial Rain.
Use after Ruin skill to reduce its cooldown. If in Boundless MP state (Nightmare Set effect), use before Celestial Rain hits after its cooldown starts.
Standard 4 stacks, buff, and Ruin skill combo.
With Cull, Serendipity becomes a viable option because it benefits a lot from the effects of Cull.
With Judgment, prioritize Serendipity for the double full-stack damage.
In most cases Celestial Rain is more practical over the long run. The Awakening skill combo can be used for speedrunning easier content.
Prioritized by damage. Serendipity benefits the most from both card effects.
Obtain 4 stacks and apply buffs from cards before using Ruin skills. Serendipity is viable with Cull as it benefits a lot from its effects.
Apply Wheel of Fortune's cooldown reset on priority Ruin skill or Awakening skill. Use the spacebar skill to animation cancel the first Awakening skill.
Perform optimal stacking rotation with Balance and use Serendipity second with Cull.
Perform optimal stacking rotation with Three-Headed Snake and use Serendipity second with Cull.
Cull combo with Star after Ruin skills to reduce cooldowns. Use Serendipity second with Cull.
Apply buffs prior to using Ruin skills. Prioritize Serendipity with Judgment for double full-stack damage.
Use Wheel of Fortune cooldown reset on Serendipity for double full-stack damage with Judgment.
Prioritize Serendipity with Judgment for double full-stack damage and use Star at the end for cooldown reduction.
Use Spiral Edge to obtain 4 stacks before using Balance. Buff with Twisted Fate before alternating Ruin + full stacking with enhanced Stacking skills from Balance.
Use Spiral Edge to obtain 4 stacks before using Balance. Buff with Twisted Fate before alternating Ruin + full stacking with enhanced autoattacks from Three-Headed Snake.
Perform basic stacking rotation and apply Twisted Fate buff before using Wheel of Fortune to use on priority Ruin skill twice.
Perform basic stacking rotation and apply Twisted Fate buff before using Star at the end for cooldown reduction. Star can also be used after Celestial Rain to optimize its cooldown.
Perform basic stacking rotation and apply Wheel of Fortune on priority Ruin skill to use it twice. Use Star at the end to reduce cooldowns.
